All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DataItem
 
Difficulty
Difficulty represent how hard it is to cook a certain Recipe (how many steps needed, how many tools needed)
EndUser
EndUser contains all data relating to a specific user.
HtmlItems
 
IndexController
The index page is the welcoming page the user lands in when first entering the website.
Ingredient
Ingredient contains the information relative to a specific ingredient.
IngredientRepository
 
IngredientRepositoryImpl
 
IngredientService
 
IngredientServiceImpl
 
ItemsController
Shows all the products that the user has or all the products in one of the user's pantryZones
PantryLoogerConfiguration
 
PantryZone
PantryZone represent a place where the User stores his food It is also the place where we make our measurements
PantryZoneProduct
PantryZoneProduct is an extension of Product It has the same information but on top of that also contains information on how much of it the User has and where the User stores the product
PantryZoneRepository
 
PantryZoneRepositoryImpl
 
PantryZoneService
 
PantryZoneServiceImpl
 
Product
Product is an extension of Ingredient, instead of just containing the broad information about a product, it also holds how much of that product is in one pack and what barCode it is associated to
Recipe
Recipe contains the information relative to a specific recipe.
RecipeController
Allows the user to see all teh recipes, he can add them to his favourites, or he can indicate that he wants to cook one and the ingredients that he needs for it will be added to his shopping list
RecipeRecommender
The RecipeRecommender is a static class that uses information like ingredients in the pantry and the user's preference to give recipe recommendation
RecipeRepository
 
RecipeRepositoryImpl
 
RecipeService
 
RecipeServiceImpl
 
ScannerController
shows the page that allows the user to scan a product and to add it into his pantry
SensorData
Represents one measurement of one sensor of one sensor-box.
SensorDataApiControler
allows the user to see the temperature, humidity and brightness in each of the places where he has put a sensor
SensorDataRepository
 
SensorDataRepositoryImpl
 
SensorDataService
 
SensorDataServiceImpl
 
SensorType
SensorType splits up the data received by the arduino into three categories, they are handled differently depending on them
ShoppingList
ShoppingList is a list of ingredients (and their amount) that the user needs to buy.
ShoppingListController
allows the user to access his shoppingList
ShoppingListRepository
 
ShoppingListRepositoryImpl
 
ShoppingListService
 
ShoppingListServiceImpl
 
Tag
A Tag is used to represent different properties of a Recipe or Ingredient It can be used to notice the user for certain allergen in a recipe.
TagFlag
TagFlag splits up the tags attached to recipes into three categories, they are handled differently depending on them
TagRepository
 
TagRepositoryImpl
 
TagService
 
TagServiceImpl
 
Time
Represents time needed to cook a recipe
UserController
allows the user to see all the data and sensor boxes related to his account, he can modify that data (preferences, username, password...) and can logout of his account
UserRepository
 
UserRepositoryImpl
 
UserService
 
UserServiceImpl
 
UserTagRelationship
 
WebSiteApplication
